attributes.action: ALLOW ALL EX-GURKHA'S AND FAMILIES TO SETTLE IN THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all serving, and ex-serving Gurkha's be granted the rights to settle in Britain after their service to the Crown with their families and to be paid the same pension as other servicemen and women.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gurkhas-rights/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
